Restaurant Jericho is a unique dining experience off the beaten track, literally and metaphorically.

Restaurant Jericho is a unique dining experience off the beaten track, literally and metaphorically. For the food lovers curious of heart who want to truly feed their souls and discover ‘food at one with place’.

Our history

Take a soulful exploration through Jericho’s distinctive terroir and very best homegrown ingredients; often handpicked moments before serving for remarkable freshness and flavour.
